resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157970</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157970</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Food Chains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelketten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaînes Alimentaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes De Alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cicli alimentari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροφικές αλυσίδες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encadenamientos De Alimento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the parts of a typical food chain and includes an interactive activity to set up several food chains in varying ecosystmes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environmental science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food chains</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Teile einer typischen 
Nahrungsmittelkette zeigt und eine interaktive Aktivität 
einschließt, um einige Nahrungsmittelketten in unterschiedlichen 
ecosystmes aufzustellen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les parties d'une 
chaîne alimentaire typique et inclut une activité interactive pour 
installer plusieurs chaînes alimentaires dans les ecosystmes 
variables</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre as partes de uma 
corrente de alimento típica e inclua uma atividade interativa para 
ajustar acima diversas correntes de alimento em ecosystmes variando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra le parti di un ciclo 
alimentare tipico ed include un'attività interattiva per installare 
parecchi cicli alimentari nei ecosystmes di variazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τα μέρη μιας 
χαρακτηριστικής τροφικής αλυσίδας και περιλαμβάνει μια διαλογική 
δραστηριότητα για να ιδρύσει διάφορες τροφικές αλυσίδες στην 
ποικιλία ecosystmes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra las partes de un 
encadenamiento de alimento típico e incluye una actividad interactiva
para instalar varios encadenamientos de alimento en ecosystmes que 
varían</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimawissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelketten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaînes alimentaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">correntes de alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cicli alimentari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβαλλοντική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροφικές αλυσίδες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">encadenamientos de alimento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>

version:3.0

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>

          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">CTC Kingshurst Academy</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

            <taxon>
              <id>377</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">ecology</string>

    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
